Package pbxuniverse

Class PBXPixel

java.lang.Object
pbxuniverse.PBXPixel
public class PBXPixel
extends Object
ExpanderVerse pixel data type. Holds color, coordinate mapping and hardware interface information for each pixel.

  • Method Details

    • setMapCoordinates

      public void setMapCoordinates​(PVector v)
      Sets a pixel's world map coordinates. In ExpanderVerse, all maps are 3D. If you're not using one or more coordinates, just set them to zero.
      Parameters:
      v - - world coordinate vector

    • getMapCoordinates

      public void getMapCoordinates​(PVector v)

    • setNormalizedCoordinates

      public void setNormalizedCoordinates​(PVector v)
      Sets a pixel's normalized coordinates. Unless you're creating a specialized normalization, it is not normally necessary to call this method. The normalized coordinate map should be more-or-less automatically maintained, or you can renormalize the entire display from the ExpanderVerse object if you need to.

      In ExpanderVerse, all maps are 3D. If you're not using one or more coordinates, just set them to zero.

      Parameters:
      v - - normalized coordinate vector

    • getNormalizedCoordinates

      public void getNormalizedCoordinates​(PVector v)

      public void setIndex​(int n)

      The map index tells which pixel in a PImage of appropriate size corresponds to this LED

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(int c)
      Sets rgb color of a pixel in the backing buffer. (Doesn't set the actual outgoing packet data 'till draw time.)
      Parameters:
      c - - a Processing color() object

      public int getColor()
